# iru_device_parameters (Data Source)

List parameters and their status for a specific device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_parameters" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
}

output "device_parameters" {
  value = data.iru_device_parameters.example.parameters
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Read-Only

- `parameters` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--parameters))

<a id="nestedatt--parameters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `parameters`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String)
- `status` (String)
